The students quickly gather around me, asking for autographs and selfies. I happily oblige, knowing that my popularity will help me make connections with these young people. The next thing I know, we are headed to his room. He leads me inside, locking the door behind us. We fall onto the bed, ripping off our clothes as we go. Our bodies press together, skin against fur, hearts pounding in unison.
